Reason Mercury::MachineDaemon::registerBirthListener ( const Address &  srcAddr,
Bundle &  bundle,
int  addrStart,
const char *  ifname 
)

This method registers a callback with machined to be called when a certain type of process is started.

Note:
This needs to be fixed up if rebind is called on this nub.

Reason Mercury::MachineDaemon::registerDeathListener ( const Address &  srcAddr,
Bundle &  bundle,
int  addrStart,
const char *  ifname 
)

This method registers a callback with machined to be called when a certain type of process stops unexpectedly.

Note:
This needs to be fixed up if rebind is called on this nub.

Reason Mercury::MachineDaemon::registerBirthListener ( const Address &  srcAddr,
const InterfaceElement &  ie,
const char *  ifname 
)

This method registers a callback with machined to be called when a certain type of process is started.

Parameters:
ie The interface element of the callback message. The message must be callable with one parameter of type Mercury::Address.
ifname The name of the interface to watch for.

Reason Mercury::MachineDaemon::registerDeathListener ( const Address &  srcAddr,
const InterfaceElement &  ie,
const char *  ifname 
)

This method registers a callback with machined to be called when a certain type of process stops unexpectedly.

Parameters:
ie The interface element of the callback message. The message must be callable with one parameter of type Mercury::Address.
ifname The name of the interface to watch for.

Reason Mercury::MachineDaemon::findInterface ( const char *  name,
int  id,
Address &  address,
int  retries = 0,
bool  verboseRetry = true 
)

This method finds the specified interface on the network.

WARNING: This function always blocks.

Returns:
A Mercury::Reason.

bool Mercury::MachineDaemon::queryForInternalInterface ( u_int32_t &  addr  ) 

This function queries the bwmachined daemon for what it thinks is the internal interface.

Parameters:
addr A reference to where the address will be written on success.
Returns:
True on success.
